definition: Any person at all.
sentence: Does anyone know the answer to this question?

definition: The short, thick first digit of the human hand.
sentence: He gave a thumbs-up to show his approval.

definition: An area or stretch of land having a particular characteristic or use.
sentence: They entered a no-parking zone.

definition: On one occasion or for one time only.
sentence: She visited Paris once last year.

definition: The direction towards the point of the horizon 90Â° clockwise from east.
sentence: They traveled south for the winter.

definition: Moving through the air with wings.
sentence: The flying bird soared high above the trees.

definition: Having a sharp, pungent taste or smell; not sweet.
sentence: The medicine had a bitter taste.

definition: The structure forming the upper covering of a building or vehicle.
sentence: They repaired the roof after the storm.

definition: The day of the week before Thursday and following Tuesday.
sentence: Our meeting is scheduled for Wednesday.

definition: Free from error; in accordance with fact or truth.
sentence: Please correct any mistakes in the document.

definition: Newly made or obtained; not canned, frozen, or otherwise preserved.
sentence: She bought fresh vegetables from the market.

definition: A person who operates the flying controls of an aircraft.
sentence: The pilot safely landed the plane.

definition: A large African mammal with a very long neck and forelegs.
sentence: The giraffe reached high into the tree for leaves.

definition: To follow the commands or guidance of.
sentence: Dogs are trained to obey their owners.

definition: To move along on foot.
sentence: They decided to walk to the park.

definition: Almost; very close to.
sentence: She nearly missed the bus.

definition: A human being regarded as an individual.
sentence: He is a kind and generous person.

definition: To move something in a downward direction.
sentence: He had to lower the blinds to block out the sun.

definition: Lacking kindness; harsh or cruel.
sentence: It was unkind of him to ignore her.

definition: A tool or person that pastes or glues things together.
sentence: The paster applied glue to the labels.

definition: Tiny drops of water that form on cool surfaces at night.
sentence: The grass was wet with morning dew.

definition: Amphibians with long hind legs, webbed feet, and a protruding tongue.
sentence: The frogs croaked loudly near the pond.

definition: Having no one else present; on one's own.
sentence: She enjoyed spending time alone reading.

definition: To operate and control the direction and speed of a vehicle.
sentence: He learned to drive a car at sixteen.

definition: Very good or excellent.
sentence: They had a super time at the amusement park.
